post.title: Day 01 - Friday, January 01, 2021
post.content:
It's the first day of the year and I decided to learn Android and iOS Development. I am also starting this little blog where I will make one post each day about what i learned that day in Programming and the Language I am learning and may be on other subjects too.

What I Learned Today

  • Learned about what React Framework to use and when to use it from this video by Ben Awad.
  • Started Android Development with Java with this course by FreeCodeCamp.org.
  • Learning GatsbyJS React Framework for this blog.
